txt.en: Instance: Skin of Bregmor
Defeated Ythel
'What is this? Hold?'
Find the lair of the dragon Bregmor.
'After all that you have cost my pack?'
Defeat the leader of the Angmarim force.
'Would you now deny me prey as well?'
'The pack must be told!'
'Come pack! There is prey to hunt!'
'Narchuil will be forged anew and serve Angmar once more!'
'You are much stronger prey. I look forward to feasting on you.'
'You shall fall before the pack!'
'The pack will eat well this day!'
'Now let us see how you fare against a  hunter of the pack!'
'To the hunt, brothers! Here is the prey I spoke of!'
Seek out and stop the Angmarim from obtaining the hide of Bregmor
Defeat Ythel
The worm hisses in rage!
'No!'
'Come closer, [placeholder], and see the power of Angmar!'
'Alas, it seems thou art too late again, my friends.'
'The fight was long and hard and many of Ythel's pack were slain.'
'You shall pay for the Spirit-master's death!'
'Come my brothers! Feast on their flesh!'
'Good, more prey.'
'Come pack! Show our might!'
'Prey should not kill! Prey should be killed!'
Yrjänä told you where to find the lair of the dragon Bregmor, though he did not know whether the dragon still lived or not.
'Prey!'
'Hold a moment, Ythel.'
'I would like a word with my old friends.'
'Thou shalt have thy prey soon enough, Ythel.'
'Thine eyes do not deceive thee! Though he was a lesser dragon, Bregmor put up quite a fight.'
'Yet in the end, Bregmor fell before Angmar's might... as will all things.'
'Now the beast's hide shall serve Angmar. The fires of Tham Mírdain shall be stoked once again!'
'Prey should not be so strong!'
'However, thou needest not concern thyself with that.'
'Ythel, thou mayest have thy prey now.'
'I must take my gift to my associates...'
